name: Swing Solver
description:
Control the swing at will and aim for the goal! Fascinating trajectories drawn by a pendulum. "Swing Solver" is an easy yet profound physics action puzzle.



  • Easy yet profound action using swing. All you need to do is click and release. But the actions are infinite!
  • Acceleration tiles, moving platforms, warp gates, and other obstacles that can drastically alter the ball's movement. If you can't control them, you'll hit a saw!
  • Replays show the beautiful trajectory drawn by the pendulum after each success. The cooler the success, the more beautiful the trajectory!
  • Simple graphics highlight the beautiful orbit of the pendulum. The world made of blue squares and round balls looks like a physics notebook.
  • Calm sounds that match the graphics.

The only actions used are firing and disconnecting the wire. It is a simple operation, but difficult to master. Where do you connect the wire? When to disconnect? Watch the movement of the pendulum and control the ball perfectly with a single wire!
